rasayanika palibhodha nashaka ha pohora walin midi 100% kma kabanika waga ratawanta anukulawa sidukala haki apage palathuru bhoga wala aswanu ihala milakata obata alewi kirime awasthawa sathuya.apa aayathanaya magin obata.....*palathuru wagawa sadaha wana panshu parikshana *wagawanta awashya siyaluma krushikarmika upades *palapurudu krushi upadeshakawarunge sewaya obe waga bimatama pamina sapayima.*usas thathwaye nirogi palathuru pala *siyaluma kabanika pohora ha kabanika palibhodha nashaka laba ganime hakiyawa *wagawa sadaha kamkaru sewawan sapayima *waga bim sadaha awashya jala sapayum paddhathi nirmanaya karadima *obage kabanika aswanu apa wisinma miladi ganime sewawa krushi karmanthaye niyathu obata menma krushi karmanthayata yomuwimata adahas karana obatath apage mema palathuru waga wyapruthi samaga sambanda wiya haki bawin wadi dura thorathuru sadaha nopamawa apa amathanna.

ithihasa poth walata anuwa ostrliyawe mul padinchikaruwan wanne brithanyaye sita pituwahal karanu labu sorun saha mankolla karuwan samuhayaki. 19 wana siyawase mul bhagaye brithanyaye aarthika thathwaya kada watimath ee ha nagunu aparadha rallath nisa piri ithiri giya sira gewal walata agana piliyamak lesa brithanyayan dutuwe dakshinardha golaye atha kelawaraka karkasha parisarayakin hebi wishala mudu bimak wu ostreliyawayi.potha pathata anuwa brithanyaye sita ostreliyawata prawahanaya kerunu sirakaruwange sankhyawa 150 000 ikmawayana athara in thunen ekak pamana sorun wu athara mankolla karuwan, minimaruwan aadin mita athulath wiya.

abesinhauthuru mada palathe pawathina dadi niyangaya hethuwen paniya jalaya nomathiwa pida windina janathawata paniya jalaya labadima sandaha janadhipathithumage upades matha sindi giya waw aashrithawa lin kapi‡∑ôm wishesha wyapruthiya bulankulama pahalagama wawa aashrithawa wishesha wyapruthi amathya es.em.chandrasena saha uthuru mada palath pradhana amathya es.em.ranjith samarakon mahathwarunge pradhanathwayen aarambha keruni.me yatathe anuradhapura disthrikkaye lin dahasak (1000) saha polonnaruwa disthrikkaye lin thunsiyak (300) idikaranu labana athara peradeniya wishwawidyalaye upakulapathi mahacharya athula senarathna mahatha athulu bhuwidya anshaye jyeshta kathikacharyawarun pirisak jalaya labaganima sandaha lin hariya yuthu mattama saha ema jalaya minis paribhojanaya sandaha kotharam sudusu dayi widyathmakawa parikshana katayuthuwalin mema wyapruthiya sandaha sahaya dakwanu labayi.niyangaya hethuwen waw ha lin sindiyamen paniya jalaya laba gatha nohakiwa sitina uthuru mada palathe janathawa pilibanda wishesha wyapruthi amathya es. em. chandrasena mahatha wisin janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mathithuma danuwath kirimen pasu wawata kisidu haniyak nomathi wana aakarayata waw aashrithawa pawathina ‚Äúkattakaduwe‚Äù paniya lin idikirimata gowi sanwidhana niyojithayange ekangathawa matha thiranaya kala bawa wishesha wyapruthi amathya es. em. chandrasena mahatha pawasayi.aarthika sanwardhana amathyanshaya, wishesha wyapruthi amathyanshaya ha uthuru mada palath sabhawa eekabaddhawa waw aashrithawa paniya jalaya sandaha lin idikirime katayuthu sidukaranu labana athara uthuru mada palath sabhawa lin idikirime katayuthu sandaha rupiyal laksha thunaka mudalak laba de.niyangayen pida windina gammana kara bawusar mangin laba dena jalaya pramanawath nathi nisa mema wada piliwela arambaena athara bawusar mangin paniya jalaya laba dima digatama kriyathmaka wana bawa da amathyawaraya sandahan kaleya.me anuwa anuradhapura disthrikkaye pradeshiya lekam kottasa mattamin ma.nu.pa., wilachchiya, madawachchiya, kabithigollawa, padawiya, horowpothana, kahatagasdigiliya, galenbindunuwawa, palugaswawa, rambaawa, mihinthale, thirappane, palagala ha galnawa pradeshaye da polonnaruwa disthrikkaye dimbaulagala, madirigiriya ha walikanda pradeshiya lekam kottasa walada sindigiya waw aashrithawa paniya jalaya labadima sandaha lin idikirimata piyawara gane.me awasthawata palath sabhawe sabhapathi ti. em.aar. siripala, manupa pradeshiya sabhawe sabhapathi pi. bi. en. jayasundara, peradeniya wishwawidyalaye upakulapathi mahacharya athula senarathna, jyeshta kathikacharya ech. em. dharmagunawardhana, samaja widyagnya aacharya upali wirakon, pashchath upadhi apekshaka es. em. pi. ji. es. kumara athulu pirisak kopaya, palanaya karagatha nohaki sakaya yanadi manasika aabadha lakshana hataganimata hethuwa molaye rasayanika dra,wyayawala asamathulithathawa nisa nisi paridi snayu sampretashana karyaya siduwima walakimayi.ewita snayu sampre shanaya siduwanuye badhakari pasubimak yatatheya.atham daththa sangnya samprerashanaya wana athara atham daththa sangnya sampredashanaya nowe.ewita sampreashanaya nowanna wu daththa sangnya nisa adala molaya sanjananaya karaganna thorathuruwala adupadu athiwe.me aduwa pirawima sandaha bohowita sathyaya thathwayen paribahira agayum ha nirnayaka bhawitha kirimata sidu wime ahithakara prothipalaya wiwidha bhra nthi ha mayamaya thathwayan athara sithiwili siragathawimayi.histiriya thaththwa biya ha sakaya bandu ayahapath manasika swabhawa rasak hataganimata mewani manobhawayak behewinma iwahalwe.kopaya,kroadhaya ha sakaya bandu ayahapath manasika lakshana samanyana piyawi minisekuta pawa hataganiyi.namudu molaye rasayanika drayawyaawala samathulithabawa nisa ebandu de samanyu pudgalayekuta palanaya karagatha hakiya.namudu molaye ebandu sithiwili palanaya karaganima sandaha awashyapa rasayanika drarawyada hinga pudgalayekuta siya sithathula athiwana ebandu ayahapath manasika aawega palanaya karaganimata nohakiwe.ehi prayathipalaya thamage manasa palanaya kala nohaki wimayi.mese palanaya karaganimata nohakiwima nisa thamagema sithe athiwana ayahapath aakalpa sithiwili ha hangimwala godurak wimata ee pudgalayatama siduwe.ehi prakathipalaya manasika roga athiwima we.manasika roga kayika roga menma manase athiwana ekthara rogi thathwayaki.eeta awashyama charya ho aushadha pramathikara yedimen adala roga suwakaragatha hakiya.
